tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MediaItems (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    media_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    release_year INT,
    sequel_id UUID,
    prequel_id UUID,
    spin_off_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Relationships (
    relationship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    media_item1_id UUID,
    media_item2_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (media_item1_id) REFERENCES MediaItems(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (media_item2_id) REFERENCES MediaItems(id)
);
